item.title: New Livestream: Build GraphQL Services With Spring Boot Like Netflix

item.title: In Memory of Stiver
item.description: On October 20, the original author of the Fernflower Java decompiler, Stiver, passed away after a long fight against glioblastoma. Stiver was a German programmer of Russian origin, primarily developing software for medical equipment. Twenty years ago, he developed a deep professional interest in Java virtual machine internals. You may remember his research blog posts, [â€¦] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/idea/2024/11/in-memory-of-stiver/
